channel.title: Cell Blogs Internet War Xhtml Google Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Cell Blogs Internet War Xhtml Google Gmail on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: google is my favorite friend/evil entity
item.description: this is an excellent write up on the incredible google maps. the most important thing he says is: I also think it bears noting that Google is pulling out all the stops to build rich web apps, no matter how weirdly they have to hack the browser to make them go. And I strongly believe that this is a trend that is here to stay – XHTML Strict/CSS/etc be damned.
